ssot__DataUsePurpose__dlm.name: Data Use Purpose
ssot__DataUsePurpose__dlm.description: The Data Use Purpose DMO represents the purpose of contacting a prospect or customer, such as billing, marketing, or surveys.

ssot__CanDataSubjectOptOut__c.description: An indicator whether a user can opt out of data use for a specific purpose.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Data Use Purpose DMO.

ssot__Name__c.description: The purpose name, for example third-party data sharing, marketing, billing, or shipping.

ssot__Description__c.description: The description of the purpose of the data use.

ssot__EntityId__c.description: A reference ID to class of data specific to data use purpose, for example product.

ssot__EntityInstanceId__c.description: A reference ID to instance of an entity.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LegalBasisId__c.description: A reference ID to legal basis of data use.

ssot__CanMaintainPerContactChannel__c.description: An indicator whether data use purpose can be maintained per contact channel.

ssot__CanMaintainPerContactPoint__c.description: An indicator whether data use purpose can be maintained per contact point.

ssot__CanMaintainPerParty__c.description: An indicator whether data use purpose can be maintained per party.
